attributes.action: Get our Rememberence Day Parade back.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Horwich, Bolton, Lancs, our parade has been cancelled.
This is due to being asked to pay £18,000 towards the cost of the police attending.
This will affect these parades all over the country.
We want to parade in honour of the fallen, this should be free.
Please sign,& get our parade back!!!!!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Get our Rememberence Day Parade back."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14149.asp

Prime Minister's Office
